caption.title: LTB-specific antibody responses in DBS eluates and plasma in ETEC-patients.
caption.p: The Bland-Altman analysis of LTB-specific IgA (A), IgG (B), IgM (C) antibody responses between DBS eluates and plasma specimen of ETEC-patients are shown. Spearman correlation of LTB-specific IgA (D), IgG (E) and IgM (F) between DBS eluates and plasma specimen of ETEC patients.
